Text.Page: You vanquish your inner demons and defeat Khemadia.

...

You have returned from your inner purgatory, and awakened to your true strength.

It is time for you to return to the mortal world and face the Black Dragon once more.

This is my gift, please take it.
Go, and bring peace back to the world...

The Black Dragon did major damage to the Veil.
But its threat is ended now.

I must restore the Veil.

No one will ever set foot in this place again, other than I, Mystel, the Goddess of Fate."Does this mean that...?"

Velika is safe. Velik... myself... we are safe as well.

But the device that the cultists were using...
I felt a dark energy from it that I've never experienced before...

We must keep a watchful eye out for their return.

It is nice to see you again, .

I received a message from the Valkyon Federation. The city of Velika is planning a banquet, and they wanted me to deliver your invitation.
Halran will be there too. The banquet will be attended by numerous luminaries, as well as many of your old friends.

The invitation is enchanted to transport you to Velika. Just use the invitation when you're ready to go.
